items.title: Meta previews new parental controls for its AI experiences

items.title: Reddit expands its AI-powered search to five new languages

items.title: OpenAI pauses Sora video generations of Martin Luther King Jr.
items.description: OpenAI is pausing AI video generations of Martin Luther King at the request of the late civil rights activists' estate.

items.title: Defunct electric aircraft startup Lilium’s tech lives on over at Archer
items.description: Archer prevailed in a competitive bidding process that included Ambitious Air Mobility Group and U.S. based Joby Aviation.

items.title: VC legend Ron Conway quits Salesforce Foundation after Benioff’s National Guard comments
items.description: Ron Conway has been on the board of the Salesforce's philanthropic organization for 10 years.
